title: COVID-19 Pandemic as a Driver for Spreading Virtual Care Globally: The Future Starts Now.
text: COVID-19 Pandemic as a Driver for Spreading Virtual Care Globally: The Future Starts Now.

similar.title: Struggling to get started.
text: As the world attempts to cope with the devastating impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, researchers about to start PhDs and postdocs face particular challenges.
abstract: As the world attempts to cope with the devastating impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, researchers about to start PhDs and postdocs face particular challenges.
